answers.answer: I assume you are hypothyroidic.  Have you discussed these problems with your endocrinologist?

Hey! You sound like me!All I can say [because you did not mention it] have you spoke to a doctor about over active hormones?About 15 years ago my doctor realized my problems were hormonal and I was prescribed a very expensive birth control pill [sorry! can't remember the name of it for nothing] and after the first month I was loosing weight like crazy! I use to ovulate 6 times a month which was making me so extremely sick and that birth control pill stopped it all! I had to stop taking it because it was  so expensive!And now I have different health issues along with the normal weight problem as always. I do not have Diabetes nor Hypoglycemia, I was just checked and after reading your post I have a bad feeling they are going to do me like you. I am being checked for my Thyroid next!All I can say is it is very frustrating!I am very active but, I am always exhausted even after a nap or from sleeping through the night. I work  full time and take care of my kids and run everything at home [divorced mom]. So I will not just put it on stress because I believe everyone has different levels of stress.If you find out anything new please share your thoughts.Good Luck!

question: Hi everyone, I am hoping that someone out there will have an answer.  I am 31 years old and have gained over thrity pounds because of a thyroid problem which has still yet to be completely taken care of.  I have been working with two nutritionalist and exercise regularly.  I can not lose weight.  I have spoken to two of my doctors and they say there is nothing that can be done.  They say my metabolism is shot and just smile at me.  I have asked them if there is any drug or something out there that can help a person who has an actual metabilism problem and has  with 200% effort tried to lose the weight.  They say there is nothing and I can't believe there is nothing out there.  Most people try to give me suggestions on how to eat and I tell them I have been down the road.....I exercise......I have done everything right (and the nutritionalist agrees that I have)  but nothing is working.  It has effected my life dramatically.  I don't ever want to have sex because the sight of myself makes me sick.  I also don't need to talk to a therapist about my feelings because nobody will ever be able to make me accept what I look like now.  Sorry if I sound negative I am just looking for an answer.  Please help.
title: Searching for an answer
